title: Gun Shots
author: JGray
text:
Hidden Name: J. Cebron Cook

Anyone who has spent any amount of time next to a ten year old practicing a woodwind instrument for the first time knows how horrendous a sonic attack can be. :)

See you Monday!

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: anyone who has better than average high-frequency hearing can tell ya that

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
Yeah, sonic attacks can be horrible.
Just hearing clarinets/flutes being out of tune gives me shivers.
